attributes.action: reduce the current blood alcohol limit of 80mg/100ml to a minimum of 50mh/100ml, preferably zero.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Scientific evidence is clear; there is no ´safe´ level of alcohol. A clear message needs to be sent that if you drive you do not drink at all.

While 50mg/100ml may be a reasonable compromise, cutting it to close to zero would prevent more road accidents.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
